items.name: Anne Klein Women's Bracelet Watch
items.description:
• Silver-tone watch featuring ribbed outer dial with applied Roman numeral indices and brushed inner dial with short hands and logo

  • 30-millimeter metal case with mineral dial window

  • Japanese quartz movement with analog display

  • Alloy bracelet with jewelry clasp closure

  • Water resistant to 30 meter (99 feet): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming
